techs_text: I have advanced skills in Javascript, Typescript, React.js, Vue.js, and Next.js. I also have experience with Angular, Django, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I use tools such as Git, Trello, Jira, Confluence, Slack, and AWS.
